name: notablog
description: Generate a minimalistic blog from a Notion.so table.

scripts.report:deps_graph: npx depcruise --exclude '^node_modules' --output-type dot --prefix 'https://github.com/dragonman225/notablog/tree/master/' src/index.js | dot -T svg > assets/deps_graph.svg
scripts.upgrade: pnpm i squirrelly@latest notionapi-agent@latest nast-util-to-html@latest nast-util-from-notionapi@latest @dnpr/task-manager@latest @dnpr/fsutil@latest eslint@latest dependency-cruiser@latest --save-exact

author: dragonman225
